sentence.Network_en: Residents in general are poor and undereducated, and live in sub-standard housing.
sentence.Network_cn: 居民们普遍都很贫穷，受教育程度低，居住条件较差。

sentence.Network_en: Men carrying sub-machine guns seized the five soldiers and drove them away.
sentence.Network_cn: 持冲锋枪的几名男子俘虏了5名士兵并开车将他们带走。

sentence.Network_en: The big losers will be the undeveloped countries, especially sub-Saharan Africa.
sentence.Network_cn: 受害最深的将是不发达国家，尤其是非洲撒哈拉沙漠以南地区。
